    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    static void
    addToGenome(String genomeName)
    Add Srna to any Genome by reading BlastResults and extracting the lower e-value result
    Srna with an identities less than 25% are not kept!!!
    static void
    createConservationTables()
    Read Srna.PATH_CONSERVATION table and display it in HeatMapView
    Headers are reorganized by their phylogeny positions
    static void
    createConservationTables10403S()
    Read sRNAConservation10403S.txt table and display it in HeatMapView
    Headers are reorganized by their phylogeny positions
    static void
    extractInfo(ArrayList<Srna> sRNAs)
    From Blast Result extract Genome containing the sRNA
    A filter is applied to keep results with identities above 50%
    static BlastResult
    extractPosition(Srna sRNA, Genome genome, TreeMap<String,String> accessionToName)
    From Blast Result extract position in the Genome of each sRNA
    Srna with an identity lower than 25% are not inserted
    static void
    multiSpeciesAlign()
    Run a Blast for each sRNA on a list of Genomes given in tempDatabase

    Run a Blast for each sRNA on a list of Genomes given in tempDatabase
    static void

    Run a Blast for each sRNA (found in Oliver et al. in 10403S genome) on a list of Genomes given in tempDatabase

    • addToGenome

      public static void addToGenome(String genomeName)
      Add Srna to any Genome by reading BlastResults and extracting the lower e-value result
      Srna with an identities less than 25% are not kept!!!
      This method has to be run after multiSpeciesAlign() because it will uses the Blast Result files in Temp folder
      Parameters:
      genome -

    • extractPosition

      public static BlastResult extractPosition(Srna sRNA, Genome genome, TreeMap<String,String> accessionToName)
      From Blast Result extract position in the Genome of each sRNA
      Srna with an identity lower than 25% are not inserted
      Parameters:
      sRNAs -
      Throws:
      IOException
